channel.title: Help with npc!
channel.description: i wanted to make like around 20 npcs of the same type or atleast different in a area and make it so no player can attack them can any1 help me make this or send me a code i saw santascape with like 50 santas in the same place so i wanted to do that with other npcs and somewhere else saying go zammy or w/e im doin this for my zammy wars game can any1 help? :confused:
